subject: Re: [junit] Can JUnit be used for GUI testing
msgSnippet: ... Google java gui junit .  You will turn up a variety of options.  See also the yahoo group java-gui-testing .
messageBody:
On Fri, 2 Jun 2006 at 01:07:29, suresh vittal wrote:

> Hi,
>
> I need some information regarding JUnit. All I have heard is that JUnit can
> and is used widely for unit testing the JAVA code.
> Can the JUnit be used to test the GUI related applications? If so, how can
> we use it for system testing of GUI applications.
>

Google "java gui junit". You will turn up a variety of options. See also the
yahoo group "java-gui-testing".
